column1: #Text=General Sung says : " It is an honor to welcome you to the Outer Wall , young Avatar , but your help is not needed . "
#Text=" General Sung says : " Well ... uh , technically yes , but he was quickly expunged .
#Text=Nevertheless , that is why the city is named Ba Sing Se .
#Text=They do n't call it Na Sing Se .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , thanks for the tour , but we still got the drill problem .
#Text=" General Sung says : " Not for long .
#Text=To stop it , I 've sent an elite platoon of earthbenders called the Terra Team .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's a good group name .
